mods.abstract: In this exposure the image is oriented verticallyThe camera stands under the arcade fronting the Cabildo facing upriverPart of the facade of the building on the corner of Saint Peter and Chartres may be seen through the arch on the right of frame.

titleInfo.title: New Orleans Negative Exposures and Prints, circa 1900-1930
